verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him out of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>If<s%> any <S%H120>man<s%> of you <S%H7126>bring<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> your <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> even of the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> and of the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> be a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> sacrifice of the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> let him <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish:<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it of his own <S%H7522>voluntary<s%> <S%H7522>will<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And he shall <S%H5564>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering; and it shall be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for him to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him.

And he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H1121>bullock<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that is by the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>
And he shall <S%H6584>flay<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and <S%H5408>cut<s%> it into his <S%H5409>pieces.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and lay the <S%H6086>wood<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> on the <S%H784>fire:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> shall lay the <S%H5409>parts,<s%> the <S%H7218>head,<s%> and the <S%H6309>fat,<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> on the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%>

But his <S%H7130>inwards<s%> and his <S%H3767>legs<s%> shall he <S%H7364>wash<s%> in <S%H4325>water:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> to be a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> sacrifice, an offering made by fire, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> be of the <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> namely, of the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> sacrifice; he shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> it a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>

And he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5408>cut<s%> it into his <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> with his <S%H7218>head<s%> and his <S%H6309>fat:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall lay them in <S%H6186>order<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%>

But he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%> and the <S%H3767>legs<s%> with <S%H4325>water:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> it <S%H3605>all,<s%> and <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> it is a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> sacrifice, an offering made by fire, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> sacrifice for his <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be of <S%H5775>fowls,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> of <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> it to the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H4454>wring<s%> off his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H6999>burn<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof shall be <S%H4680>wrung<s%> out <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H7023>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%>

And he shall <S%H5493>pluck<s%> away his <S%H4760>crop<s%> with his <S%H5133>feathers,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6924>east<s%> part, by the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H1880>ashes:<s%>

And he shall <S%H8156>split<s%> it with the <S%H3671>wings<s%> thereof, but shall not <S%H914>divide<s%> it asunder: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> on the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is on the <S%H784>fire:<s%> it is a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> sacrifice, an offering made by fire, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
